targetLine.text: Please, Emmett...you couldn't have read that when you were a little boy, it was only first published ten years ago.
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: So do I. 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea, my absolute favorite. The first time I read that when I was a little boy, I wanted to meet Captain Nemo and...

contextAfter.text: Oh, yes, well...I meant it made me feel like a boy.
I never met a woman who liked Jules Verne before.
I never ever...met a man like you before.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
